        protected static I2CBus getBus(int busNumber,
                               Callable<I2CBusImpl> constructor,
                               long lockAquireTimeout,
                               TimeUnit lockAquireTimeoutUnit)
                        throws I2CFactory.UnsupportedBusNumberException,
                               IOException
        Factory method that returns bus implementation.
        Parameters:
        newInstanceCandidate - if no bus has been created yet, this instance is used
        Returns:
        appropriate bus implementation
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown in case there is a problem opening bus file or bus number is not 0 or 1.
        I2CFactory.UnsupportedBusNumberException
